dc_title_s: The Hudson by daylight : map from New York Bay to the head of tide water : containing names of steams islands and heights of mountains according to the latest coast survey : also, the names of prominent residences, historic land marks, the old reaches of the Hudson and old Indian names
dc_description_s: Cover title: The Hudson River map.; "Copyrighted 1894, by Wallace Bruce."|14 x 252 centimeters|Scale [1:95,040]|General Map Collection
